conbody.p: The following table lists behavioral changes and known issues that exist in Euca2ools 3.1.2. Please contact Eucalyptus support for workarounds or prescriptive guidance for these issues. You can use the support portal https://support.eucalyptus.com or email us directly at support@eucalyptus.com.

row.entry: Some euca2ools commands may fail when used to work with resources that use non-ASCII characters.
HTTPS certificate validation cannot be disabled. Either use plain HTTP or ensure your cloud uses a certificate that was signed by a certificate authority the client trusts.
